headline: NVIDIA Partnerships Push Real World AI Adoption While Valuation Questions Linger
summary: NVIDIA announced new collaborations with Dassault Systèmes, EPRI, Prologis, Opentrons Labworks, and Cyngn to advance real world AI adoption across industry, infrastructure, and life sciences. The Dassault Systèmes partnership focuses on building science based industry "World Models" for industrial and engineering AI. Work with EPRI and Prologis targets distributed inference AI data centers that bring computing closer to the edge while helping manage grid load. Integrations with lab robotics...
